name: Expediceon
description:
Roll dice into an 8x6 grid, then using the rolled die faces, re-roll dice until you can meet the requirement. Each face has a unique function, some re-roll columns or rows while others might let you choose which dies to re-roll. Additionally, three alternative die add additional re-rolling (and more) capabilities, but come with a cost of losing resources from the goals or with more volatile effects.

Left Click - Use selected die
Right Click - Swap selected die to an alternate die (if any enabled)
Escape - Forfeit Run and open score board

Made by FearJudge for GMTK Game Jam 2022 in less than 48 hours.

Hello. I'm a First year Game Development Student from Finland. Thank you very much for checking out my game. Sorry if you run into issues. Hope you still have fun. :)
